question: How do I stop the opening movie
hint_text: Press the escape key to exit the opening animations

question: How do I re-watch the opening movie
hint_text: You can't re-watch the opening movie without restarting the game. You can save your state before you restart, and then resume after the movie.

question: What is the goal of the game
hint_text: The overall goal is to stop the thief before they escape to Karkas 4

question: Who is Alias Node
hint_text: Your are Alias Node, a human detective for Amalgamated Vacuum on Armpit VI

question: What is the Thirsty Tentacle
hint_text: The Thirsty Tentacle is a spaceport bar catering to a variety of aliens

question: How do I save the game
hint_text: Use the system button on your PDA to save the game state

question: Who is Zelda
hint_text: Zelda is the name of Alias Node's personal digital assistant

question: Why is there a silhouette of a person or alien in the corner
hint_text: The silhouette on the PDA represents the player character (i.e. you)

question: How do I get started?
hint_text: Best way tot get started is to find things that you can click on

question: How do I interact with objects
hint_text: To interact with an object, click on it, then choose an action from the menu that appears

question: How do I interact with characters in the game
hint_text: Click on a character, then choose an action from the menu that appears

question: Why is the light on my PDA blinking
hint_text: Try clicking on the PDA light to find out what it does

question: Why is the light on my PDA blinking
hint_text: The blinking light pn your PDA means you have an incoming message

question: Is there a map
hint_text: There is a map of the current setting in your PDA

question: Can I enlarge the map
hint_text: Use the zoom button on your PDA to enlarge the map

question: How do I pick up an object
hint_text: Click on an object, then select the "Pick up" action from the menu that appears

question: How do I save an object
hint_text: Click on an object, then select the "Stash" action from the menu that appears

question: Where are my saved objects
hint_text: Most objects that you want to carry are miniaturized and saved in your PDA

question: Where is my inventory
hint_text: Your inventory is the "stash" in your PDA

question: What can I do in the entry vestibule
hint_text: Look around in the entry vestibule

question: What can I do in the entry vestibule
hint_text: Have you tried the lockers in the entry vestibule?

question: What happens if I bring the data cart into the bar?
hint_text: Don't bring the datacart into the bar

question: How do I use the lockers
hint_text: You need to find a locker that is available

question: How do I open a locker
hint_text: You can't open a locker if it is already in use

question: Why can't I use a locker
hint_text: You can open a locker if it is available

question: Who is Maksh
hint_text: Maksh is your detective partner

question: Where is Maksh
hint_text: Maksh has been kidnapped by the thief

question: When does the shuttle leave for Karkas-4
hint_text: Have you checked the flight information to find out when the shuttle to Karkas 4 leaves?

question: When does the shuttle leave for Karkas-4
hint_text: The flight information is on the monitor

question: When does the shuttle leave for Karkas-4
hint_text: The flight information is on the monitor in the vestibule

question: Why doesn't Thud remember my name
hint_text: Thud is not very bright

question: How can I chat with an alien character in the bar
hint_text: You need to greet characters before you can chat with them

question: How do I do Empathy Telepath
hint_text: Chat with an alien in the bar

question: How do I do Empathy Telepath
hint_text: You can only EmpTel with some aliens

question: How do I do Empathy Telepath
hint_text: If a flashback is available, the EmpTel process will kick in while you are chatting with the character

question: Which aliens have flashbacks
hint_text: Are you sure you want me to tell you which aliens have flashbacks? Maybe you should find out for yourself

question: Which aliens have flashbacks
hint_text: A good place to start is to start an EmpTel flashback with Thud, or Fleebix

question: Which aliens have flashbacks
hint_text: You can also EmpTel with Bettaker, Cilia, Click Snap Snap Rattle, Deven-7, Seedrot, and Soldier 714-Z-367 and someone else.

question: Which aliens have flashbacks
hint_text: Later, you will be able to start an EmpTel flashback with someone else in the bar

question: How do I use the terminal outside the bar?
hint_text: You can't use the terminal in the vestibule if it is broken

question: How do I use the terminal outside the bar?
hint_text: Maybe someone will fix the terminal in the vestibule

question: How do I use the terminal outside the bar?
hint_text: Try the terminal in the vestibule again later

question: How does the voice printer work?
hint_text: Maybe you should try turning on the voice printer before using it

question: How does the voice printer work?
hint_text: The voice printer can detect if someone is lying or hiding information

question: How does the voice printer work?
hint_text: You should probably just leave your voice printer on all the time

question: Why doesn't my residue printer work?
hint_text: Does the residue printer use battery?

question: Where can I get a battery for my residue printer
hint_text: Have you seen anything else that might run on batteries?

question: Where can I get a battery for my residue printer
hint_text: Have you looked outside the bar for something that runs on electricity?

question: Where can I get a battery for my residue printer
hint_text: The advertising sign in the vestibule uses a battery

question: Where can I get a battery for my residue printer
hint_text: You can take the battery from the advertising sign in the vestibule once the sign has been fixed

question: Why did my gear stop working?
hint_text: If your gear is not working, you should check the time

question: Why did my gear stop working?
hint_text: Your gear won't work if someone has started jamming the signal

question: Why did my gear stop working?
hint_text: Your should find the infrared jammer and turn it off

question: Where is the infrared jammer?
hint_text: The infrared jammer won't be easy to find

question: Where is the infrared jammer?
hint_text: Try some out of the way places to look for the infrared jammer

question: Where is the infrared jammer?
hint_text: Are you sure you want me to tell you where the jammer is?

question: Where is the infrared jammer?
hint_text: Look in the Moist Grotto for the infrared jammer

question: How does the residue printing wand work?
hint_text: Be careful about flashing the residue printer around. You are under-cover

question: How does the residue printing wand work?
hint_text: Your residue printer can tell you who may have recently touched an object

question: How does the residue printing wand work?
hint_text: Residue prints wear off quickly

question: What if I forgot something from a flashback?
hint_text: Have you checked with your PDA to see what it recorded from your flashback

question: What if I forgot something from a flashback?
hint_text: Look in the log for information about completed flashbacks

question: How much time do I have to crack the case?
hint_text: You better crack the case before the shuttle leaves for Karkas IV

question: How much time do I have to crack the case?
hint_text: The shuttle to Karkas 4 leaves at 22:50. Karkas 4 is outside your jurisdiction.

question: What do I need to do in the Thud flashback?
hint_text: There's not too much you can do in the Thud flashback. Try interacting with all the objects.

question: What do I need to do in the Thud flashback?
hint_text: Fleebix will tell you what to do when you are Thud's flashback

question: What do I need to do in the Thud flashback?
hint_text: All you need to do to solve Thud's flashback is just take the cup outside

question: What do I need to do in the Thud flashback?
hint_text: Pick up the cup and go outside of your room

question: Why can't I do anything when I EmpTel as Fleebix
hint_text: You can't do much on your own as Fleebix, because you are in a jar

question: Why can't I do anything when I EmpTel as Fleebix
hint_text: When you are Fleebix, you can rely on Thud to help you with many taks

question: How do I find Thud when I am in a jar?
hint_text: I could tell you how to find Thud, but maybe you should EmpTel with Thud first if you haven't

question: How do I find Thud when I am in a jar?
hint_text: If you want to find Thud, try clicking on the door

question: How do I find Thud when I am in a jar?
hint_text: Tell Thud to pick up the cup and come outside

question: What is the goal of the Fleebix  flashback?
hint_text: The overall goal of Fleebix's flaschback is to help him remember the name of the planet that Thud and Fleebix need to go to for their new navigation job

question: What do I need to do in the Fleebix  flashback?
hint_text: Read the audition notice to find out where Thud and Fleebix need to go first

question: What do I need to do in the Fleebix  flashback?
hint_text: Thud and Fleebix need to get to the Quantelope Lodge

question: How do I get to the Quantelope lodge
hint_text: To get to the Quantelpoe Lodge, Thud and Fleebix should take a bus

question: How do I get to the Quantelope lodge
hint_text: Not all the busses go to the Quantelope Lodge. Try to pick the right one.

question: How do I get on the bus to Quantelope Lodge?
hint_text: You need a token to get on a bus in Yzore

question: How do I get on the bus to Quantelope Lodge?
hint_text: Look,  there's a token in the cup!

question: How do I get on the bus to Quantelope Lodge?
hint_text: Ask Thud to take the token from the cup

question: How do I get to the lodge if I missed the bus?
hint_text: Wait a while. There should be another bus soon

question: How do I get to the lodge if I missed the bus?
hint_text: Remind Thud to pick you up before getting on the bus

question: How do I get to the lodge if I missed the bus?
hint_text: Also make sure Thud is holding the token before getting on the bus

question: How do I get to the lodge if I missed the bus?
hint_text: Make sure Thud has Fleebix and the token before trying to get on the bus

question: Thud got on the wrong bus.
hint_text: That's too bad that you got the wrong bus. Maybe this  bus will take you somewhere interesting.

question: Thud got on the wrong bus.
hint_text: Maybe there's something you can do at Glom Hole?

question: How do I get to Quantelope Lodge from Glom Hole
hint_text: You can't take a bus from Glom Hole to the Quantelope Lodge. Find another way to get to the Quantelope lodge.

question: How do I get to Quantelope Lodge from Glom Hole
hint_text: Have you looked at the mailbox near Glom Hole?

question: How do I get to Quantelope Lodge from Glom Hole
hint_text: Have Thud open the mailbox

question: How do I get to Quantelope Lodge from Glom Hole
hint_text: Have Thud get the letter from the mailbox

question: What do I do about the plane crash?
hint_text: Go investigate the plane crash

hint_text: Is there anything usable at the plane crash site?

question: What do I do about the plane crash?
hint_text: What's lying on the ground near the plane wreck?

question: What do I do with the large box, near the plane?
hint_text: Look at the mailing label on the large box near Glom Hole

question: What do I do with the large box, near the plane?
hint_text: That's a very big empty box

question: What do I do with the large box, near the plane?
hint_text: Can you fit inside the large box with Thud?

question: What do I do with the large box, near the plane?
hint_text: Can you mail the large box to the Quantelope Lodge?

question: How do I get the box to the lodge?
hint_text: Have Thud leave the large box by the mailbox

question: How do I get the box to the lodge?
hint_text: Put the label on the large box before getting into it

question: How do I get the box to the lodge?
hint_text: Climb inside the large box and wait

question: What do I do inside the box?

question: What can I do inside the mail truck?
hint_text: Not much to do here. Look around the truck. Don't get caught.

question: What can I do inside the mail truck?
hint_text: Examine the small package in the mail truck

question: What can I do inside the mail truck?
hint_text: Stash the small package that you found in the mail truck

question: What can I do inside the mail truck?
hint_text: Listen to the drivers of the mail truck

question: What can I do inside the mail truck?
hint_text: Wait for the truck to deliver you

question: The box was delivered to the wrong place
hint_text: Did you listen to the truck drivers?

question: The box was delivered to the wrong place
hint_text: The people here are missing something.

question: What do I do with the Nav dial?
hint_text: Have Thud set the nav dial to 42

question: What do I do with the Nav dial?
hint_text: You should set the nav dial after the other couple goes to look for goggles

question: What do I do with the Nav dial?
hint_text: After setting the nav dial, get back in the box and wait

question: We arrived too early at Quantelope Lodge for the audition
hint_text: The lodge members will let you in for your audition as soon as the clock reaches Glurg Hour Fifteen

question: We arrived too early at Quantelope Lodge for the audition
hint_text: Check the time on the clocktower

question: We arrived too early at Quantelope Lodge for the audition
hint_text: Have Thud fix the clocktower clock

question: How do I fix the clocktower clock?
hint_text: First, you need to figure out what's wrong with the clock

question: How do I fix the clocktower clock?
hint_text: Have Thud climb the clocktower

question: How do I fix the clocktower clock?
hint_text: What did Thud see in the clocktower that might help you

question: How do I fix the clocktower clock?
hint_text: This might take a few tries to solve the clocktower puzzle. Work with Thud to try all the controls

question: How to fix the clock mechanism?
hint_text: Have Thud push the yellow button, and bring you the status report from the clocktower

question: How to fix the clock mechanism?
hint_text: Notice the X on the status report from the clocktower. Something is wrong with the mechanism.

question: How to fix the clock mechanism?
hint_text: Have Thud push the red button, then pull the lever on the clocktower controls

question: How to fix the clock mechanism?
hint_text: Have Thud bring you the crystals from the clocktower

question: What do I do with the clocktower crystals
hint_text: Work with Thud to replace the bad crystal in the clocktower.

question: Where do I get a replacement crystal
hint_text: If you don't have a replacement crystal yet, you won't be able to fix the clocktower and complete the puzzle

question: Where do I get a replacement crystal
hint_text: Did you look in the small package when you were inside the mail truck?

question: How do I replace the crystals?
hint_text: Thud will have to follow instructions carefully: put crystal 1 in the first slot, and so forth. Use the replacement crystal instead of the broken one. The X or O on the top of the printout repreents crystal position #1.

question: All the crystals are in place, now what?
hint_text: After replacing all the crystals, have Thud pull the lever

question: All the crystals are in place, now what?
hint_text: Have Thud push the yellow button to get a new status report

question: All the crystals are in place, now what?
hint_text: Are all the slots on the status report reading O?

question: All the crystals are in place, now what?
hint_text: If there is still an X on the status report, try replacing the crystals again

question: What do I do after the crystals are fixed correctly?
hint_text: Once the correct crystals are in place, have Thud push the green button, then the blue button in the clocktower

question: How do I pass the audition?
hint_text: The audition is too hard for Thud, but Fleebix can do it
speaker: Thud

question: How do I pass the audition?
hint_text: In the simulator, try to use low numbers when you can
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I pass the audition?
hint_text: In the simulator, avoid backtracking when you can. But sometimes you can't avoid it.
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the simulator
hint_text: Tale it easy, and complete the simulator one level at a time
speaker: Thud

question: How do I complete the easy level of the simulator
hint_text: The easy level is easy. Try it on your own first.
speaker: Fleebix

hint_text: For the easy level, start with Yzore
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the easy level of the simulator
hint_text: For the easy level, travel to Bulbus, then H'poctyl, then Pinna, Armpit, Karkas, and Fruufnia
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Moderate level of the simulator
hint_text: The moderate level isn't much harder than the easy level of the simulator
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Moderate level of the simulator
hint_text: For the second level of the simulator tart at McKelvey
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Moderate level of the simulator
hint_text: On the second (moderate) level of the simulator, travel  to Wilbur, Medge, Wall, Roman, Woo, Bok, Woo again, then Pizer
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Hard level of the simulator?
hint_text: The hard level of the simulator is but you should have the general idea by now
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Hard level of the simulator?
hint_text: Start the hard level at Maggot's nest
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Hard level of the simulator?
hint_text: To omplete the hard level, travel to Slug, Pustule, Toe Jam, Hellhole, Toe Jam, Uranus, then Backwater
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Expert level of the simulator
hint_text: If you finished the other levels of the simulator, you should be an expert by now!"
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Expert level of the simulator
hint_text: Start the expet level at Mankala
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Expert level of the simulator
hint_text: To complete the expert level, travel to Garfunkel, Fuge, Battlefish, Fuge, Beacon, Pack-Rat, Archeroids, then Peggleboz
speaker: Fleebix

question: How do I complete the Expert level of the simulator
hint_text: If you followed the earlier clues, you should be done with the simulator. Congratulations are in order.
speaker: Thud
